title: Kül Masalı
overview: Özge, who comes from a poor and humble background, has been working as a cook in a restaurant for six years. They meet Arat Giraylı, the heir of the Giraylı family, one of the richest and most established families in Turkey, fall in love at first sight and get married. When Özge enters the mansion where Arat's family lives as a bride, it suddenly takes her from a love story to a world full of intrigue.
